commands.name: az devops admin banner add
commands.summary: Add a new banner and immediately show it.
commands.syntax:
az devops admin banner add --message
                           [--detect {false, true}]
                           [--expiration]
                           [--id]
                           [--org]
                           [--type {error, info, warning}]

commands.name: az devops admin banner list
commands.syntax:
az devops admin banner list [--detect {false, true}]
                            [--org]

commands.name: az devops admin banner remove
commands.syntax:
az devops admin banner remove --id
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]

commands.name: az devops admin banner show
commands.syntax:
az devops admin banner show --id
                            [--detect {false, true}]
                            [--org]

commands.name: az devops admin banner update
commands.summary: Update the message, level, or expiration date for a banner.
commands.syntax:
az devops admin banner update --id
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--expiration]
                              [--message]
                              [--org]
                              [--type {error, info, warning}]
